mapper.select: select ag.year,ag.numberofparticipants,ag.rate,ag.gdp_value from country c, (select x.year,x.country,x.numberofparticipants,x.rate,g.gdp_value from gdp g, (select z.year,z.country,z.numberofparticipants, z.numberofparticipants/z1.numberofparticipants AS rate from (select ge.year,an.country,count(distinct a.id) AS NumberOfParticipants from athlete a, athlete_event ae,athlete_nationality an,country c,game_event ge where ge.season=#{season, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.name=#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ae.year=ge.year and a.id = ae.athlete_id and a.id = an.athlete_id and an.country = c.code and ae.event_id= ge.event_id group by ge.year,an.country order by ge.year ASC)z INNER JOIN (select ge.year,an.country,count(distinct a.id) AS NumberOfParticipants from athlete a, athlete_event ae,athlete_nationality an,country c,game_event ge where ge.season=#{season, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.name=#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ae.year=ge.year and a.id = ae.athlete_id and a.id = an.athlete_id and an.country = c.code and ae.event_id= ge.event_id group by ge.year,an.country order by ge.year ASC)z1 on z.year-4 = z1.year and z.country=z1.country)x where x.year = g.year and x.country = g.nationality ORDER BY x.year ASC, x.country ASC) ag where c.code = ag.country
